import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useLanguage } from '../components/LanguageSelector'; import { translations } from '../utils/translations'; const EmpresaFamiliar = () => { const { language } = useLanguage(); const t = translations[language].empresaFamiliar; const [selectedImage, setSelectedImage] = useState(null); const [selectedGallery, setSelectedGallery] = useState(null); const [currentImageIndex, setCurrentImageIndex] = useState(0); const mockupGalleries = { papeleria: [ { src: '/mockups/presentationtarget.png', description: t.gallery.descriptions.businessCards }, { src: '/mockups/carta2.png', description: t.gallery.descriptions.letterhead }, { src: '/mockups/1.jpg', description: t.gallery.descriptions.envelopes1 }, { src: '/mockups/2.jpg', description: t.gallery.descriptions.envelopes2 } ], empaques: [ { src: '/mockups/Red Classic Wine Stationery Page Border A4 Document.png', description: t.gallery.descriptions.productBox }, { src: '/mockups/Copilot_20251003_143538.png', description: t.gallery.descriptions.bottleDesign }, { src: '/mockups/PixVerse_V5_Image_Text_360P_A_breathtaking_cin.mp4', description: t.gallery.descriptions.limitedVideo, type: 'video' } ], digital: [ { src: '/images/digital1.jpg', description: t.gallery.descriptions.socialMedia }, { src: '/images/digital2.jpg', description: t.gallery.descriptions.webDesign }, { src: '/images/digital3.jpg', description: t.gallery.descriptions.digitalAds } ] }; const openModal = (imageSrc) => { setSelectedImage(imageSrc); }; const openGallery = (galleryType) => { setSelectedGallery(galleryType); setCurrentImageIndex(0); }; const closeModal = () => { setSelectedImage(null); setSelectedGallery(null); setCurrentImageIndex(0); }; const nextImage = () => { if (selectedGallery) { setCurrentImageIndex((prev) => prev === mockupGalleries[selectedGallery].length - 1 ? 0 : prev + 1 ); } }; const prevImage = () => { if (selectedGallery) { setCurrentImageIndex((prev) => prev === 0 ? mockupGalleries[selectedGallery].length - 1 : prev - 1 ); } }; return (
{/* Hero - Storytelling */}

Family Business Rebrand

A company with 50 years of history needed to modernize its image to connect with new generations without losing its essence. My challenge was to create an identity that honored the family legacy while giving it freshness and relevance in the digital age.

+90%
Improved modern perception
{/* El Antes */}

The Before

Original Identity

openModal('/wine.png')} >
Previous Logo
Click to view

Original Color Palette

Previous Communication

openModal('/Screenshot 2025-09-30 214613.png')}>
Screenshot Comunicación
Click para ver
{/* El Desafío */}

The Challenge

Modernize the identity

Update the visual image without losing 30 years of essence

Attract new generations

Connect with younger and digital audiences

Maintain the legacy

Preserve the seriousness and trust of the family brand

Improve digital presence

Optimize the brand for digital platforms

{/* El Proceso */}

The Process

1

Research

Analysis of history, values and current perception

2

Moodboard

Visual and conceptual exploration of the new direction

3

Exploration

Logo, typography and color palette iterations

4

Implementation

Application across all touchpoints

{/* El Resultado */}

The Result

{/* Nuevo Branding */}

New Identity

openModal('/logooo.png')} >
New Logo (Minimalist)
LOGO

New Palette (#4f192a + complementary)

Typography (Serif)

Aa Bb Cc
Clean, modern typography

Moodboard

openModal('/moodboard1.png')} > { e.target.style.display = 'none'; e.target.nextSibling.style.display = 'flex'; }} /> Sofisticado
openModal('/moodboard2.png')} > { e.target.style.display = 'none'; e.target.nextSibling.style.display = 'flex'; }} /> Confiable
openModal('/moodboard3.png')} > { e.target.style.display = 'none'; e.target.nextSibling.style.display = 'flex'; }} /> Fresco

Current Communication

openModal('/scree.png')} >
Screenshot Comunicación
Click para ver
{/* Mockups */}

Mockups

openGallery('papeleria')} > Click para ver galería

Stationery

openGallery('empaques')} > Click para ver galería

Packaging

openGallery('digital')} > Click para ver galería

Digital

{/* Conclusión - Impacto */}

Rebrand Impact

The rebrand successfully positioned the company as a modern and reliable option, maintaining its family essence while effectively connecting with new generations. Modern perception increased by 90% and significantly boosted attraction of young customers.

+90%
Modern perception
+65%
New customers
100%
Satisfaction
Request Consultation View More Projects

e.stopPropagation()} />
)} {/* Modal para galería de mockups */} {selectedGallery && (
e.stopPropagation()}>

{/* Descripción */}

{mockupGalleries[selectedGallery][currentImageIndex].description}

{currentImageIndex + 1} of {mockupGalleries[selectedGallery].length}
{/* Botones de navegación */} {/* Botón cerrar */}
)}
); }; export default EmpresaFamiliar;
